bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Overhead-Type Distribution Transformers 500 kVA and Smaller: High Voltage, 34 500 V and Below; Low Voltage, 7970/13 800Y V and Below
Redline
IEEE Standard for Overhead-Type Distribution Transformers 500 kVA and Smaller: High Voltage, 34 500 V and Below; Low Voltage, 7970/13 800Y V and Below - Redline
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C57.12.20-2011 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.12.20-2005) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Certain electrical, dimensional, and mechanical characteristics and safety features of single- and three-phase, 60 Hz, mineral-oil-immersed, self-cooled, overhead-type distribution transformers 500 kVA and smaller, high voltages 34 500 V and below, and low voltages 7970/13 800Y V and below are covered in this standard.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
